properties.address: New Wolsey Theatre Co Ltd, Ipswich, Suffolk IP1 2AS
properties.description: On Mondays from 27th January - 31st March 2025, The New Wolsey Theatre is opening as a Warm Place for those that need it. We will have free hot drinks, a hot meal, warm clothes bank, and kids area.
properties.title: New Wolsey Theatre Warm Place

properties.description: Our warm space is run by a consortium of organisations: Jetty Lane, a charity which inspires hope, facilitates support and makes opportunities happen for young people, Rubbish Walks' Vintage Litter Museum (the first in this country) and Transition Woodbridge, a community-led group that aims to strengthen the local economy, reduce the cost of living and prepare for a future with less oil and a changing climate. We're based in 2 bright blue recycled shipping containers, if you walk next to Kingston Field, towards the River Deben you won't miss us! Our space will continue to stay open every Friday and Saturday through the spring and summer into autumn 2024.
properties.title: The Pod at Jetty Lane in Woodbridge

properties.address: Castle Hill United Reformed Church, Ipswich, Suffolk IP1 6QF
properties.description: A warm welcome and free tea, coffee and biscuits. Accessible toilets and free WiFi. Large selection of cake on first Tuesday of the month (By donation, if able) Knitting group also on 4th Tuesday
properties.title: Warm Welcome Space
